alerts.clipboard_too_big: Clipboard text exceeds maximum size and will be truncated.
alerts.text_truncated: Text was truncated to fit the application limit.

alerts.clipboard_error: An error occurred while pasting from clipboard. Check console.

alerts.preset_not_found: Selected preset not found in cache.

alerts.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting the preset. Check console.
alerts.restore_error: An error occurred while restoring presets. Check console.

editor_alerts.too_big: Cannot add text: maximum size reached.
editor_alerts.paste_truncated: Pasted text was truncated to avoid exceeding the maximum.
editor_alerts.too_big_clipboard: Text too large to paste directly. Use 'Overwrite clipboard' or 'Paste clipboard new line' from the main window.
editor_alerts.clipboard_no_text: Clipboard does not contain plain text.
editor_alerts.drop_too_big: Dropped text is too large. Use the main window buttons to add large text.
editor_alerts.truncated_limit: Text was truncated to the application limit.
editor_alerts.calc_error: An error occurred while calculating. Check console.
editor_alerts.text_truncated: Text was truncated to fit the application limit.
editor_alerts.clipboard_overflow: Clipboard text exceeds the maximum allowed and will be truncated.
editor_alerts.paste_error: An error occurred while pasting from clipboard. Check console.
